title: SuperBetter: Mental Health
description:
Improve mental health, resilience and social-emotional skills.
 
SuperBetter is at heart a simple and transformative idea – we can use the same strengths naturally displayed in game play to confront real-life challenges, build skills, manage stress & practice self-care.
 
SuperBetter uses the psychology of game play in all of life. Playing SuperBetter means bringing a gameful mindset to real-life - challenging yourself, going for epic wins, adopting a secret identity, completing quests, battling bad guys, activating power-ups and checking-in with allies. The 7 rules for living gamefully is a framework to be stronger, happier, braver & more resilient in everyday life.
 
Invented by researcher & game designer Jane McGonigal, SuperBetter is backed by science. In a randomized controlled trial at University of Pennsylvania playing SuperBetter for 30 days was associated with significant improvements in mental health and resilience.
 
The SuperBetter app makes it simple to go for epic wins, track your gameful strengths and build your whole-person resilience - mental, social, emotional & physical. Proven results in 10 minutes a day.
 
SuperBetter is for youth, teens, young adults & everyone who wants to unlock their heroic potential using the power of living gamefully. Over 1 million people have played SuperBetter.
 
SUPERBETTER PRODUCTS
 
> Hero account:    Play SuperBetter on your own.
> Host account:    A web-based portal to host challenges for squads.
> Player account: Join squad challenges when invited by a host.
 
HERO ACCOUNT: PLAY ON YOUR OWN
 
14-day free trial
 
Grow your mental health, social-emotional wellbeing & physical resilience with a library of over 40 solo challenges.
 
Create your own challenges to go for personal epic wins.
 
Join squad challenges from hosts.
 
Watch a demo video on the SuperBetter website.
 
HOST ACCOUNT: HOST CHALLENGES FOR SQUADS
 
Promote mental health, resilience, social-emotional learning and skills for success with groups in a way that's practical & engaging.
 
Designed for educators, the Host account is available to anyone:
 
> Middle & high school teachers promote social-emotional learning.
> Small groups, teams & clubs foster youth mental health & resilience.
> Universities empower student success & student wellbeing.
> Small businesses make it a low-cost employee wellbeing program.
 
The web-based host portal makes it easy to create squads & host challenges. Squad challenges bring the SuperBetter methodology to life. Each has an epic win and 5-days of activities. Hosts select from a library of over 90 challenges to promote mental, emotional, social & physical resilience, or create custom challenges to have squads go for any epic win they choose. Squad members play about 10 minutes a day on the SuperBetter mobile or web app. They use a free Player account or a low-cost Hero account. Learn more on the SuperBetter website.
 
PLAYER ACCOUNT: SQUAD PLAY ONLY
 
The Player account is a companion to the Host account. It is a free account to play with squads only.
 
Players can join squad challenges when invited by someone with a Host account, and play a weekly challenge hosted by SuperBetter.
 
DESIGNED FOR SMARTPHONES
 
The SuperBetter mobile app is designed for smartphones. If you have a Chromebook, iPad or tablet device you can play on the web app.
 
SUBSCRIPTION TERMS
 
The Hero account price is $24.99 per year.

Payment will be charged to your credit card. Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the current subscription period. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Any unused portion of a free trial period will be forfeited when you purchase a subscription.
